10804MBTAA-d-08-04-91-ATK.Narrative: THE TRAIN WAS CROSSING OVER AT HALL FROM #1 TO #2 TRACK AND DERAILED THE 26TH, 27TH, AND 28TH HEAD CARS. ACCORDING TO THE ENGINEER, HE WAS OPERATING AT APPROXIMATELY 6 MPH WHEN THE DERAILMENT OCCURRED. THERE WERE NO SPEED TAPES ON THE ENGINES. THE DERAILMENT INVESTIGATION COMMITTEE DETERMINED THAT CAR NO.# CNA 404576 DERAILED AT THE FACING POINT SWITCH AT HALL, CAUSING CAR NO.# BAR 767 TO DERAIL ALL WHEELS AND CAR NO.# ACFX 76652 TO DERAIL THE LEAD TRUCK. FURTHER INVESTIGATION DEVELOPED THE CAUSE AS CAR NO.# CNA 404576 NO.#2 END (NON-HANDBRAKE END) LEADING NO.#4 WHEEL WITH VERTICAL FLANGE WHICH CAUSED THE WHEEL TO CLIMB THE SWITCH POINT.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
